Serialized Form

  • Package paoo.game.database

    • Class paoo.game.database.DataStorage

      class DataStorage extends Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • itemAmounts
          ArrayList<Integer> itemAmounts
          The corresponding list of quantities for each item in the inventory. The index of each amount matches the index of its respective item name in itemNames.
        • itemNames
          ArrayList<String> itemNames
          The list of item names in the player's inventory.
        • level
          int level
          The player's current level.
        • life
          int life
          The player's current life points.
        • maxLife
          int maxLife
          The player's maximum life points.
        • time
          double time
          The time played or remaining in the game, depending on the game's context.
        • xPosition
          int xPosition
          The player's x position.
        • yPosition
          int yPosition
          The player's y position.

      class GamePanel extends JPanel implements Serializable

        • assetSetter
          AssetSetter assetSetter
          Places entities and objects in the game world
        • collisionChecker

          Handles collision detection between entities

          Index of the currently active map

          Game state: Dialogue interaction

          Dynamic list for entity rendering order

          Target frames per second for the game loop

          Graphics2D context for the temporary screen

          Maximum number of available maps

        • MAX_WORLD_ROW

        • monster

        • music
          Sound music
          Manages background music
        • npc

        • objects

          Game state: Options/settings menu

          The player character
        • SCALE

          Scale factor applied to original tile size
        • SCREEN_HEIGHT

          Total screen height in pixels (576px)
        • SCREEN_WIDTH
